text: Andrew James Barr (born 29 April 1973) is an Australian politician. He is the Chief Minister of the Australian Capital Territory since December 2014. He has been a Labor Party member for the seat of Molonglo in the ACT Legislative Assembly since 5 April 2006. Barr is the first LGBT person to become an Australian head of government. He is openly gay and is married to a man called Anthony Toms.https://www.abc.net.au/news/2019-11-14/act-chief-minister-andrew- barr-marries-anthony-toms/11699170 ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Australian LGBT politicians Category:Chief Ministers of the Australian Capital Territory Category:Gay men Category:Politicians from Canberra Category:People from Lismore, New South Wales
title: Andrew Barr
